name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Customer Engineer with 13+ years of experience in technical consulting and digital transformation, delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial industries. Expertise in application security and software modernization, facilitating technology adoption and customer engagement through effective solution implementation and technical guidance.
Skilled in collaboration and coaching to enhance customer satisfaction and drive feedback loops for continuous improvement. Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with hands-on experience in frontend and backend development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, with a strong background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Demonstrated ability to implement cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while employing microservices and event-driven architectures along with CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in aligning solutions with compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
